packages.title: Garden of The Gods
packages.text: Spend a day in the Garden of the Gods exploring geologic formations, wildlife, and a unique part of nature on your very own Segway with a guide.

packages.title: Weekend at Winter Park Resort
packages.text: Winter Park Resort is an alpine ski resort in the western United States, in the Rocky Mountains of Colorado at Winter Park.

packages.title: Horseback Riding in the Rockies
packages.text: YMCA of the Rockies horseriding: This 1-hour trail ride heads west along mildly steep terrain, up Glacier Basin. This ride does some climbing, while looking down on Glacier Creek.

packages.title: Daytrip to Red Rocks
packages.text: Part of Denver's Theatres & Arenas Division, Red Rocks Amphitheatre is a naturally formed, world-famous outdoor venue just fifteen miles west of Denver. Red Rocks is recognized for its star-studded concert roster, natural acoustics and ambience, as well as its awe-inspiring hiking and biking trails.

packages.title: Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park
packages.text: As Colorado's own Grand Canyon, the Black Canyon of the Gunnison near Montrose, Gunnison and Crawford leaves visitors speechless with its beauty and dramatic landscape.

packages.title: Downtown Denver
packages.text: Denver is an outdoor city with a vibrant, walkable downtown offering urban adventures for all ages. Within a one-mile radius, you can kayak on the Platte River; explore some of the city's best museums; shop at art galleries and boutiques.
